meanings.sent1: The unathletic boy struggled to keep up with his friends during the race.
meanings.sent2: She felt unathletic compared to the other players on the team.
meanings.sent3: Despite his unathletic nature, he always gave his best effort in gym class.
meanings.sent4: Her unathletic appearance belied her inner strength and determination.
meanings.sent5: The unathletic cat tried to climb the tree but quickly gave up.

meanings.definition: Lacking skill or ability in sports or physical activities
meanings.sent1: The unathletic dancer tripped over her own feet during the performance.
meanings.sent2: He felt unathletic when he couldn't catch the ball during the game.
meanings.sent3: His unathletic attempts at basketball always ended in laughter from his friends.
meanings.sent4: She described her unathletic moves on the dance floor as a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent5: The unathletic student avoided sports day to prevent embarrassment.
